about_the_game:
Its people slaughtered... Forced to flee from its home... Heartbroken and full of RAGE, The Darkosser swore revenge on the being who ordered the extermination of its people.


Your goal is simple:

Grow stronger! Using the blood of your fallen enemies, purchase weapons and abilities, all of which grant new ways to play and battle your foes!

Classic wave-based arena combat!

Pitted against endless waves of enemies, the player must fight an endless battle to the death, all while collecting the blood of your fallen enemies! The player can select any map of their choosing to play on, ranging from the desolate Alpha Arena, the hallways of an office building, to the back alleys of a notorious crime-ridden street. There's plenty of room to fight!

Weapons, weapons, and more weapons!

The Armory, your one-stop location for new weapons, throwables, and various other WMDs! Players will be able to spend their blood on different categories of weapons, those being Light, Medium, Heavy, Misc., Melee, and throwables; the choice is yours! Indulge yourself with the finest of weapons! As you progress, you will amass a large amount of weapons. You may be asking yourself, “With all these weapons, how will I manage all of them?” No need to worry; The Armory also comes with a loadout system allowing you to create presets that you can easily access across all your games, without the need of digging through your weapons to find the guns you really like!

Sweet, sweet BLOOD!

The Shrine; the source of your power! The Shrine has two major mechanics: skills and rituals. Using the blood collected from your slain enemies, you can learn skills. Skills are your primary way to upgrade your body and existence. Skills can grant simple things like health boosts, increased ammo pools, healing, and increases to your blood gain. Skills don’t only just give increases to numbers; they also grant new ways to play! Some skills being double jumping, healing outside of combat, cheating death, and falling on enemies to instantly kill them! The Shrines other mechanic is Rituals; An extra way for players to gain blood while also challenging themselves! Whether it be skills you seek or challenges with precious rewards, it will await you in The Shrine!

content_descriptors.notes: The game is revolves around violence, killing and collecting blood. Narrated Storylines include references to criminal activity, physical and graphic violence, drug use, and references to genocide. Animated 2d Cutscenes also include violent and graphic imagery as well.
